name: Camping de Courte Vallee

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Great for Brits

description: Camping de Courte Vallee is a small,beautifully landscaped family run site, set in 10 acres of parkland close to the River Thouet and within walking distance of the medieval town of Airvault. Situated in the heart of rural France, and off the main tourist track, the site offers tranquility and a warm and friendly atmosphere in surroundings maintained to the highest standards. A haven for bird and wildlife enthusiasts!
